sentences.english: The contents of ten nutritive components of dry pleurotus eryngii were determined.
sentences.chinese: 測定了刺芹側耳幹品中多種營養成分的含量。

sentences.english: One usually pricks up one's ears when his name is called.
sentences.chinese: 人在被叫到自己的名字時，通常要側耳傾聽。

sentences.english: Peter cocked the ears has listened respectfully a while, then imitated him to sing sweetly replies it.
sentences.chinese: 彼得側耳聆聽了一會兒，然後模仿他的鳴囀回答它。

sentences.english: Apply your heart to instruction and your ears to words of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 你要留心領受訓誨，側耳聽從知識的言語。

sentences.english: The cluster analysis of varieties revealed the relationships among P. nebrodensis strains.
sentences.chinese: 揭示了白靈側耳菌株間的親緣關係。

sentences.english: And if you listen closely, you can hear the tinkle of the rattle as you move.
sentences.chinese: 如果你側耳聆聽，你會聽見撥浪鼓搖動時的叮噹聲。

sentences.english: I will turn my ear to a proverb; with the harp I will expound my riddle
sentences.chinese: 我要側耳聽比喻，用琴解謎語。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo determine the content of triterpenoids from mycelial and fruit body of Pleurotus tuber-regium(Fr.
sentences.chinese: 目的對菌核側耳中的三萜類成分進行含量測定。

sentences.english: I have heard tge Liquid murmur of the river through the darkness of midnight.
sentences.chinese: 我曾在漆黑的午夜，側耳傾聽河水潺潺。

sentences.english: Who among you will give ear to this? who will hearken and hear for the time to come?
sentences.chinese: 你們中間誰肯側耳聽此，誰肯留心而聽，以防將來呢？

sentences.english: Now my eyes will be open and my ears attentive to the prayers offered in this place.
sentences.chinese: 我必睜眼看，側耳聽在此處所獻的禱告。

sentences.english: I lended my ear to hear but there was no footstep.
And have not obeyed the voice of my teachers, nor inclined mine ear to them that instructed me!
sentences.chinese: 也不聽從我師傅的話，又不側耳聽那教訓我的人。

definition: lit. morning bell, evening drum, symbolizing monastic practice (idiom); fig. encouragement to study or progress
to chat with a low voice
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
(of animals, the wind etc) to make a mournful sound/whine/moan/wail
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
